website_summaries.verdict: Another reasonably priced and feature-packed gimbal that iPhone enthusiasts will appreciate for its enduring battery life, extra-smooth stability, and cinematic zoom controls.
cons: The Osmo Mobile 2 may work perfectly with iPhones, but unfortunately this gimbal only works with select Android smartphones

website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight stabilization makes this gimbal steady and easy to use.
pros: The 15-hour battery allows for long days of filming
Smartphone charging feature is an added bonus
Customers love the fluid footage this gimbal helps capture
cons: The DJI app is required to use this stabilizer, and it isn't a small download

customer_reviews.title: Great but has design flaws
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This gimbal is great, the battery life is amazing (and you can charge your phone off of it while filming). The shots are smooth and clean. Cons: Shooting from certain angles will get the gimbal into your shot, so be aware of that. If you use any lenses, this gimbal won’t incorporate the weight to balance it, so you’ll have to make or buy your own counterweight (I used washers). 9/14/2018 Update: I do not recommend the DJI app for filming. However, I highly recommend purchasing the app FilmicPro (well worth $14). Makes footage stunning.
customer_reviews.author: remotalia

customer_reviews.title: Best budget Smartphone Gimbal - Bar None!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Gimbal! The app works perfectly with my Galaxy S9 plus (a big phone) and my S7. I got an adapter for my ThiEYE T5 Edge and the Gimbal makes all the differance it getting great cinematic videos. A big plus is that it is now capable of operating the Filmic Pro app. I also own a DJI Phantom Drone and I can't say enough about DJI and their excellent Service.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK WITH IPHONE XS MAX
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give a better review, because all the tutorial videos I saw made it look like very easy to get it to use. BUT...the are misleading buyers by not saying it does not work with the Iphone XS Max, I tried for almost 2 hours, watching videos, trying everything they were saying, but, just because it works with the Iphone X, doesn't mean it will with the XS Max. Be aware!
customer_reviews.author: R. Gouveia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, DJI doesn't disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: I love this gimbal. It has worked so well for me in getting unique shots with my phone that I have been able to incorporate into my Youtube video's. People keep asking me if it is a low flying drone it is so smooth! I would highly recommend buying this is you are looking to add some cool B roll or additional shots to your videos you are making. For the price, you can't beat it. The only con I can come up with is it can be a little finicky to setup with getting your phone adjusted just right. I had 5 minutes of trouble which was remedied online with a quick tutorial video. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Joel B

customer_reviews.title: Works with iPhone Xs max
customer_reviews.text: By the way it works just fine with iPhone X’s max I can confirm that. You do need to slide the adjustment thing a little so that it’s manually balanced more and then it’ll work. To be fair I have not done much video yet and I’m guessing that the motors will be getting a work out but it works. It’s keepking device balanced and stabilized.
customer_reviews.author: ALK

customer_reviews.title: Great value from a leader in gimbals
customer_reviews.text: First off for the price, this is a great unit. The material feel is a tad plastic, but is solid. Again for the price it is excellent. Performance of the gimbal is stellar. The setup app for it is less than stellar needs some serious work on it, but it does work. The battery life is great and adding the camera charging port was excellent - EXCEPT good luck trying to charge when you are shooting... great idea, execution was less than stellar. Over all... this is a BUY IT.
customer_reviews.author: Graphguy

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a weak selling point
customer_reviews.text: Won't work without the app. The app crashed every time. Not ready for prime time on the Android OS! I have the top of the line Google Pixel XL 2. It should run the app. Also, why does it need an app? Seems like a weak selling point. It should just stabilize your video no matter what app you're using. Anyway, I returned it and got my money back -- but I had to pay return shipping ($17). So not happy about that. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: D. McNally

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy from seller
customer_reviews.text: *Defected* It kept cutting off after 1 to 5 seconds when fully charged. I also had to pay to return it as well.
customer_reviews.author: AP Price

customer_reviews.title: Will NOT calibrate
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in April 2018 and it worked fine for a minute. 2nd month it failed to calibrate. After months of trying to figure it out with YouTube videos and watching every video I could find on calibration, thing thing has become useless. $129 down the drain. We tried using it in Cancun for our honeymoon and there's no making it work.
customer_reviews.author: CT Media Services

customer_reviews.title: Not charging out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Nice product if yours works... I've seen a couple of those gimbals and they work really well but mine is not on that list, I received mine and it didn't charge at all, then did some research and it is a common problem with this gimbals, some just use a 2Amps cellphone charger and problem solved but others like me still can't find a solution. Send it back is not a solution for me because I'm not in the US and it costs about 60 dollars for me to send it back and get another one that might come with the same problem again, so for this one I just accepted it as a total loss of my money. Beware
customer_reviews.author: Axgarr

customer_reviews.title: Scotty, I need more power!!
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, mine refused to hold a full charge for very long. I charged it overnight and unplugged it only to find after a few hours it was DOA. Yes, the unit was actually turned off too. When I used it right after a full charge, it worked great. Easy to balance the phone and operate it. Now the only quirk is that you have to install drone software and pick the option for this. You have to create an account too and it seems pointless when all you want to do is have it keep your phone stable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Grey

customer_reviews.title: Broke right away
customer_reviews.text: The balance arm lock broke immediately so I had to leave it unlocked after balancing the phone. I am a realtor so used it primarily to take 2-5mins vids of homes for my clients. Took a while to get it started each time as you have to balance it out every time you use it, connect bluetooth, etc which was a lot of hassle just to take a very quick video (I have Samsung Galaxy S8+). I used it only a few times before it broke which is ridiculous considering it's not a cheap gadget. I returned it and won't be getting a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Vasily

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit iPhone Xs Max
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit for iPhone Xs Max. I had huge expectations. But build quality was poor as well. So just started the return process. Don’t believe the people who said it fits for Xs Max in Q&As. There is a balance glitch if you are using an additional lens like moment or moondog. But keeping that aside, it wouldn’t take a very thin case on the iphone. It’s rubbing the plastic at some moves. I tested it thoroughly. Dji has to inform folks not to use for Xs Max. Waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Prab KT

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to set up
customer_reviews.text: Even with the instructions it took me over an hour to figure out how to use it with my phone. Also, BUYER BEWARE! If you’re like me, you might have a case on your phone, particularly a “moment” case designed for ass on camera lenses like my 18mm wide angle lense, if so, be aware that with your case attached, this gimbal will NOT be able to Bluetooth to your phone making it ineffective. Now i have to choose between a good lense/image quality, and a smooth video....ugh, so disappointing. But on the other had once you finally get this thing set up and start recording, you will find that your videos are quite smooth. It does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle B. Ladd

customer_reviews.title: Great product for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a film class I was taking simply because I didn't want to shell out hundreds of dollars on a DSLR and i don't regret this decision. Awesome product would definitely recommend. Worked great with my Samsung Note 9.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Using with Samsung Galaxy Note 9
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect with my Note 9 without my heavy phone case, but it can be used with a slim case. Balance can be adjusted on both axis without problems and it works very well. Love how my videos look now.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Missing Audio Integration
customer_reviews.text: Great idea and good video but a non-starter for anyone that wants to record good quality audio with their video. YOu can't easily connect and plug in a lavalier mic and there is no real solution for Blue Tooth connected mics and no acceptance by DJI to address this major failing If you are producing videos with no need ot record auido this could work - for everyone else don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: nvt

customer_reviews.title: the size of the cell phone is very important.
customer_reviews.text: I use the Samson Note 5, it does fit the gimble head just barely, The rubber pads were not holding the phone in a very secure manor. I noticed that the form rubber was not securing the phone in the recesses. I pulled the pads out and turned them around, now the fit is perfect. It sure would be nice to have the record switch on the front side for the index finger where it should be. It is very awkward for a person with arthritic joint on the thumb to start and stop recording.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Support is a joke with this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought the osmo mobile 2. I found that it takes forever to charge and also the battery seems to die quite quickly. My biggest issue is that the product does not seem to be able to switch cameras during filming. I have tried calling support multiple times and it seems there is only one person that works for them over seas. Numerous times I asked for a US based contact and was told that it doesn't exist. All I want is someone that knows and can explain the product. Support is a joke and the product looks great but is simplistic. I am sure there a better products out there.
customer_reviews.author: Behan

customer_reviews.title: Forced APP updates should be optional rather than forced!!
customer_reviews.text: Random APP updates in the middle of the field with no internet service makes it impossible to use, as the device app will force you to update without warning, rendering the device useless until you have internet service to update the app. This update should be optional, yet it is NOT, and you will NOT be able to use the equipment. MAJOR DESIGN FLAW. Buyer beware, if this update pops on your phone you will not be able to continue using it.
customer_reviews.author: jungmen

customer_reviews.title: This is fantastic! I am using it with Samsung Galaxy S8 ...
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic! I am using it with Samsung Galaxy S8 and DJI GO app. Was afraid of OIS before it came. No problems. Advice for DJI: make Android and iPhone apps just for Osmo line. Separate it from drones. I paired it with Joby Ultraplate 208 with a grip. It was discounted, around ten bucks. Gives extra stability in hand.
customer_reviews.author: Nikola Tulimirovic

customer_reviews.title: Noise problem & Terrible DJI support
customer_reviews.text: If you put up a lightweight mobile phone, it will make a heavy noise even if it is well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Premium performance at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to buy something as expensive as the OSMO Mobile 2. I have a small budget but I just couldn't pass up DJI performance and reputation. They did not fail to deliver. I like the interface for the app. I also enjoy the editing software provided within the app for simple uploads to you tube. I recieved my Mobile 2 from Beach Camera. They have been excellent from start to finish. They have communicated with me very well and have inquired every level of my experience. Great product from a great seller.
customer_reviews.author: LilDrummerBoy2K19

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks I’ve been here for 2 hours trying to stabilize this thing and it make me no sense at all I’ve watched multiple tutorials on how to because (DJI doesn’t give you enough instructions on how). Worst product EVER! The joystick also doesn’t even work on mine it sucks I also spent nearly trying 20 minutes just to connect it to my iPhone 8 I was giving this gift to my mom for trips birthdays and more but honestly I can’t because it sucks. DONT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was going to knock down a star for Material Quality, since it's plastic... when the first one was metal, BUT, for that price, you can't complain. The device works very well with the DJI App. Hyper lapse, object tracking... just wow. If you're going to use this without the app, you might be better off choosing something else. This device + app = perfect combo.
customer_reviews.author: Aorata

customer_reviews.title: Professional looking video from a phone.
customer_reviews.text: I got this brand of gimbal because of reviews on the Android app that goes with it. It seemed to be more completely developed than competitor's models. So far the app and the gimbal have worked great. I'm impressed with the object tracking feature. I made videos with and without the Osmo to compare and they simply look more professional with the gimbal. There is jitter even in hand-held still video that is removed with this gimbal.
customer_reviews.author: Joe's son

customer_reviews.title: Vibrates Uncontrollably
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had to return mine. Fresh out of the box, it vibrated strangely...I assumed the batteries need to be charged, however after almost a day and a half to reach full charge, it keeps vibrating. I continued anyway thinking maybe it needs some weight on the gimbal to work correctly. I balance my phone, powered up...it was worse! Sounded like a dentists drill and the vibrations could be visibly seen on the video. I was unable to use the Osmo for my shoot and decided to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Todd K

customer_reviews.title: Videos look professional
customer_reviews.text: Positives:- 1. Stabilization is excellent. 2. Tracking function is the best 3. Excellent Motion lapse . 4. Worth the cost. Go ahead, you will be pleased with your purchase... Negatives or Missing:- 1. I wish it could do automatic vidio recording for a given path, like it does Motion lapse. 2. 360 degree rotation would have been great. 3. Build Material could have been better. 4. Carry bag, instead of moulded case would be useful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good gadget. Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This gimbal is really good and it gives you nice options. The app comes with everything you could possibly need, including the option to track an object down which is awesome for shoots of moving objects like a dog running or a skate practice. What I didn't like is that in some positions the gimbal shows up in the shoot. I have a galaxy s9. So be aware of this.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Battery failed after 10 months. Sent to repair facility. A week to get there and after 5 more days, sent back as “inspected.” Various emails and a phone call from Guangdon China never addressed the issue. They claimed they sent me a replacement unit but serial number matched my original unit and unit was nonfunctional. After several more emails and no luck with it, I asked Amazon for a refund and they agreed. Instead I bought the Zhyun Smooth 4 which is far superior. This company never was truthful with me and never effected a repair nor a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Nikonman

customer_reviews.title: great construction not worht the money
customer_reviews.text: you would expect that this brand DJI will provide some state of the art quality product in fact i have a DJI Spark drone wich is fantastic, but this gimbal is really not use the stabilization is so not worth it, there's not a huge difference between holding your phone with your hands or with the gimbal, takes to much time until it move to stabilize the video
customer_reviews.author: Jose Ricardo Alava

customer_reviews.title: Gimbal itself is okay but the app is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this gimbal because of many good reviews on youtube. Received it and was bitterly disappointed to find in the app store that the app is very poorly rated. I think with updates it has gotten worse. I went with the Freevision Vilta-M Pro and it is an absolutely awesome gimbal with more features
customer_reviews.author: McKinsey

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with an iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: Clever but not designed to work with an iPhone X and my iPhone is not a plus. It may work with older lighter iPhones or a camera. Clever idea, nice ad, deceptive, but nice. It was a waste of my time!!
customer_reviews.author: Pilot Bob

customer_reviews.title: QC was very bad with DJI OSMO Mobile 2
customer_reviews.text: 2 Defective OSMO Mobile 2. Gimbal doesn't respond at all, nothing just nothing. All lights are on with solid green and blue tooth connected to the phone (iphone xs max), doesn't balance and no response from the stick at all, just nothing! Did DJI QC these before shipping???
customer_reviews.author: Mike Bacani

customer_reviews.title: Poor support for iPhone XS and XS Max
customer_reviews.text: I have two issues with this device: 1) my XS Max doesn't quite fit (too heavy, too wide), 2) the app doesn't take advantage of XS features such as stereo audio recording. Not much DJI can do about the fit, but they definitely need to highlight that in the marketing material
customer_reviews.author: Mookhead

customer_reviews.title: The software is first rate and allows for some pretty awesome shots
customer_reviews.text: People complain about the plastic as compared to the prior aluminum product. I didn't not have version 1, but at $125 this thing is a deal. The plastic is very heavy and the unit feels very professional. The software is first rate and allows for some pretty awesome shots. Don't panic when the thing take 24 hours to charge upon first charge. Hook it up to a power source, not a computer to charge via USB, hopefully this will charge faster than mine did. Apparently this thing runs forever on one charge. After you have one you will not doubt it. A great addition to my kit
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gingerich

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I take it everywhere. It is actually more compact than the osmo3. Battery life ia great. Sometimes I use it as a power bank to recharge my phone. Most suitable for smaller phones. I just bought a bigger size iPhone and discovered that I need to re-adjust the balance every time I deploy it. Overall, you will enjoy the quality stable footage you record using this device.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Shaheen

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap!
customer_reviews.text: After charging the batter for 4 hours and installing the app on my phone, I couldn't get it to work. When I powered it on, it would shut back off after about 30 seconds. During the brief periods that the power was on, the record button wouldn't work and my phone just flopped all over the place. I returned it for a full refund!
customer_reviews.author: SeaAnita

customer_reviews.title: Overall, great stabilizer worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth and wonderful product. Pros: + the video when using this very stable + the plastic is great quality + the function to charge your phone while simultaneously using the stabilizer is a life saver Cons: - the device is a little clunky - the device is a little tricky to seemlessly transfer from holding it upright while in use to holding it sideways or upside down while in use
customer_reviews.author: Jamison Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Average stability, clunky app
customer_reviews.text: 1) Clunky app, too much trouble to set up for a portable solution 2) App looks just like the one for my Magic Pro, leading to confusion on which app to use 3) Stabilization not as great as they would have you believe I returned this. I’m still hunting for the perfect combination of legit stabilization, price and useability/ portability.
customer_reviews.author: AlpineShopper

customer_reviews.title: Mine was defected
customer_reviews.text: I used this after the 30 day return window. The gimbal just does its own thing and pans however it wants. I wanted this to be a cool gift for my wife when she takes photos and videos of the kids. If mine would have worked, it would have been awesome. There's a lot to learn but it's useful and especially if you have a ton of storage on your phone because the videos and the app will take up a lot.
customer_reviews.author: MMLD

customer_reviews.title: Very easy, Very effective
customer_reviews.text: Within 15 minutes of getting this, I was taking AWESOME stabilized video on my LG V30 phone that, when played back for my friends on my 50" 4k TV, made them say "Wow! what kind of camera was that. It looks professional." Yes, it works THAT well. Looks like the camera was on a dolly or boom. Does not look handheld. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dizzaddy

customer_reviews.title: Good gimbal for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was between this and the zhyun Smooth 4, however I have a DJI drone and it's a great product so I stood by DJI as a brand and this gimbal does not disappoint for the price. The stability could be better, you just need to really walk like a ninja to get super smooth footage if you are going for that cinematic look, for vlogging if you don't care about a little shakiness then go ahead and run with it.
customer_reviews.author: J P Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Not durable craftsmanship, broke within a week.
customer_reviews.text: Item broke very quickly. Seems to be an issue with the gear. I took great care to stabilize it and treated it gently. It just could not endure long hikes and an added lens with weight. When it did work, it was wonderful, and really added depth to my films. Really wished it could work. Maybe their latest models will be of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Milo

customer_reviews.title: ... when you are starting it up but that's the worst thing it been problem wise
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the program stops working and you have to reload it when you are starting it up but that's the worst thing it been problem wise. I do get a tired arm Im not use to holding it up as long as I want to so I am going to buy a tripod for it.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Valliere

customer_reviews.title: DOA, does not charge or turn on at all
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a brand new item, but the lights started blinking when I started charging the gimbal. I assumed it was just the initial charging thing. Nope. 12 hours later the lights are blinking on and off and the device shows no signs of life. I will try to do an exchange and will follow up with an update, should results vary.
customer_reviews.author: Falcon

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: This products is great. It calibrates great. It’s very stable. IT FITS THE IPHONE X and when you record a video the stability is great
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: Works great with iPhoneX
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use on a family vacation. Tried it out on a 5 day trip to Montreal. Did a great job stabilizing my video. The DJI video editing app is average. I'd recommend using another video editor with more features.
customer_reviews.author: ZPT

customer_reviews.title: No more shaky mobile phone videos
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of video episodes on our People and Projects Podcast, and the first one recorded with the Osmo got a response from a subscriber: "Hey, this one's not as shaky! What's up?" :) I've found it to be a reliable, durable, indispensable part of my equipment set.
customer_reviews.author: Andy K.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t follow well at all. You have to focus it on the object you want it to follow and if you are trying to record yourself, you have to have someone else select you to follow. Second, it only follows you for a few seconds and it’s super slow. I thought my father could use this when he skates at the skate park but it failed to our meet expectations.
customer_reviews.author: iFixiT

customer_reviews.title: One Drop then Your Out
customer_reviews.text: This gimbal is probably the best you can buy for this price! I dropped it once, however, and it cracked. It is still working, but keep in mind it is a full pvc type plastic construction. The battery life is godly... never had issues with the batteries. The stability is great however, when using an additional lens to your phone the stability gets unstable (I feel that it has a weight limit)...
customer_reviews.author: Hibiki

customer_reviews.title: 10 hours charging and only got to 80%.  DOA?
customer_reviews.text: 10 hours charging and only got to 80%. DOA? Arrived with completely dead battery. Seems like it is repackaged used item. Why would the battery be 100% dead ?
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C

customer_reviews.title: Great gimbal! I’m impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This gimbal is amazing! I highly recommend it to anyone with a smart phone! Works great and easy to use when you follow the instructions :)
customer_reviews.author: CharlieD

customer_reviews.title: JUNK...Total Junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a cruise I leave on in the morning. Actually I bought 2. Shipped one back last week because it would not take a charge. Shipped it back. Received a second yesterday and it won't charge either. Went to DJI OSMO forum and find this is a huge problem across the board. Tried 3 USB chargers and 2 cords. Won't freaking charge. SAVE YOUR MONEY. It is total junk.
customer_reviews.author: Frank S.

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: I thought this rig would bring some much needed stability in my life, but this didn't work either. The rig turned on, but nothing else worked. I have no hope left.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Love this gimbal.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this as i have never used one before but it is easy to learn how to use. I use it with my iPhone to live stream and the shots come out nice and steady. I really like that i can add it to my tripod as well. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: PALMBEACHER

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The gimbal works well, very stabilizing and the battery life is amazing. Sometimes I get the gimbal into my shots in some angles but it is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Zeki

customer_reviews.title: difficult at first but works great
customer_reviews.text: If you've never set one of these up before it is kind of difficult but if you know what you're doing it's pretty easy when I first started mine up the motors would grind I found out that I just had to finally get my phone balanced and calibrated correctly before it would stop doing that
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't work with S8 phone
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to work with a Galaxy S8. It would not set up so that the gimbles would work. It would start and stop the video though. I worked with support seeking a solution. They finally emailed me that DJI was aware of the problem and would be issueing a software update at some time in the next few weeks. I will see if that works and if it doesn't will return the device as unsuitable.
customer_reviews.author: CptKirk

customer_reviews.title: Missleading product description and requirments.
customer_reviews.text: Returning this. Prod desc is not complete. Must download an App from DJI. The app requires access to EVERY bit of data in your phone. I will not allow that. Ridiculous to access personal files like contacts for this device to work. Checked with DJI T/S, no way around it. So, the Osmo goes back. Then DJI would not pay for a return label! Amazon says they will reimburse me for return shipping. Very disapointed with DJI
customer_reviews.author: Lariet442

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this with my OP6 and it works good,. The only problem I have is it sometimes the camera catches the OSMO in the shot, just by a tiny bit...so I just till in forward and solves that problem but then the device has problems rotating left and right. So it needs some improvements. But overall my footage has been great, much better then just holding the phone. For the price I say it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest

customer_reviews.title: Takes Great Videos or Photos
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and enables you to capture super smooth videos or great photos. The DJI app is nice as it will automatically make small movies based on video you take as well. I would highly recommend this for something looking to up their video/photo game.
customer_reviews.author: Flash_87

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: It’s decent but has some issues. About half the time the calibration fails and requires a few minutes of turning it on and off again to get it working. I have pretty much constant issues when trying to shoot in portrait, to be honest I think it has only worked one time. When it works, it’s awesome... it just seems to be like flipping a coin on reliability though. My bottom line takeaway after having this thing and using it for a little over a month on several trips is always plan an extra 5 minutes before you get started just in case. It has been my experience that you cannot simply turn this on and go.
customer_reviews.author: Shane N.

customer_reviews.title: An amazing tool, very affordable
customer_reviews.text: This stedicam mount is simply incredible. It basically turns a smart phone into a quasi-professional video system. The functionality is almost miraculous. But what is more amazing is the price. When I first tried this thing in an Apple store, I assumed I was holding a device selling for about $1000. Nope. Discount that price estimate by almost 90%. I do not understand how a device of such high functionality and quality is so affordable, but that's technology, isn't it?
customer_reviews.author: J. Stanley Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Makes very steady video possible
customer_reviews.text: The unit works as advertised. The software also has some fun features, like automatic subject following, which works ok, but will loose the subject if they move too closely or move towards or away from the camera very far. But so far, compared to hand holding a phone, there is no comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Garry R.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this stabilizer because in theory it’s great. However I couldn’t get it to work properly with my iPhone XS Max. It’s either not very user friendly and I was too fed up to keep trying, or simply not compatible with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Brushworks by Dima

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet
customer_reviews.text: Honestly... It's well made... but I think there must be a knack in using it...there seems to be a lot of drifting around when using it, whereby often the person is moving slowly in front of me, ad it will lose contact... heck.. it might be the software.... soooo I can't really down-vote this because of user incompetence :P I think in time it will be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria & Glen

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think this worked in the beginning but after ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think this worked in the beginning but after watching a few YouTube tutorials on troubleshooting, it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Cocoa Doll

customer_reviews.title: Makes your videos look PRO
customer_reviews.text: I needed this to steady our Facebook live videos. It almost works perfectly for that. You can’t use the zoom feature when you are live. Why not? Fix that DJI. I like using it through the app and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Bud Ford

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Streaming/Taping
customer_reviews.text: Definitely makes for a smoother filming or streaming. I streamed for about an hour with this thing when I went on vacation and made everything easier. Since this minimizes movement and shake, it helped me do a better stream. I highly recommend it if you film or stream with your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Ray Fan

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I like this gimbal a lot. I use it all the time it works great, but there is one thing that is very annoying that I deal with using this product that makes me give it a 3 star review. When I am recording stationary or taking pictures the gimbal will slowly move either to the left or the right and by the time I finish recording or get my picture, I’m no longer centered in the frame. This happens just about every time I use the gimbal and it’s extremly frustrating the more it happens.
customer_reviews.author: jesse

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get it to run right
customer_reviews.text: DJI hasn't update the Android app to work with Osmo Mobile 2 well. It works but poorly. Sometimes it connect and sometimes not. Not only that the image stabilization isn't that great. My Samsung S8+ maxes out the dimensions to the holder and it might be too heavy for it to work well.
customer_reviews.author: KissingTaco

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It makes awesome video, and you can even run with it with almost no shake, whatsoever. The first one (refurbished) broke. I returned it and got another, which is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Buy this gimbal for the app if anything else.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gimbal for the App. I had a Chinese gimbal before this which was $20 cheaper, but the connectivity between the gimbal and phone lead to missed shots. The DJI connects much quicker and easier and the app is VERY EASY to use. I recommend going with the larger company in this case due to their access to user testing.
customer_reviews.author: sailorcolin

customer_reviews.title: Wont' fully charge or hold a charge.
customer_reviews.text: Seller might be one that sells the units that didn't pass inspection. Not sure. At any rate, unit never fully charges and then only lasts a short time before needing a recharge. Neat idea but doesn't work well.
customer_reviews.author: karlh

customer_reviews.title: some issues, but still worth it.
customer_reviews.text: this is overall an excellent gimbal. battery life is impressive. stability is rock steady. there are a few minor issues. 1st: large phones like S9+ will only fit if they have no case. 2nd: the gimbal gets somewhat jittery when its upside down (shooting low to ground footage) 3rd: there is a known instance that will occasionally cause horizontal drift. 4th: active track is glitchy with android phones. issues aside, i still love this gimbal!
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Great Price For What It Does
customer_reviews.text: GREAT little gimbal but theres a learning curve. Be sure to watch YouTube videos by other users so you can get ahead before you start using unit. It does a great job for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: App For Android Not Great But Who Cares
customer_reviews.text: No the app doesn't work great for Android. Who cares? I use my stock camera app or Filmic Pro app for Android. The gimbal provides great stabilization for this price. Stabilization is what really matters with a gimbal.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Simons

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it it’s awesome he wishes he could use it more
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it it’s awesome he wishes he could use it more. Super study footage awesome time lapse features durable. It’s an electronic what else do you want him to say.
customer_reviews.author: Channa Shelden

customer_reviews.title: Not ready for prime time yet
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay but hard to manage. It goes haywire and spins my phone round and round at least one during every live video I do.
customer_reviews.author: Speedfast

customer_reviews.title: I Love my DJI Osmo Mobile 2!
customer_reviews.text: When is the 3 coming out? What can you NOT say about this product. The functionality you get out of this used to cost thousands of dollars for a professional! Thank you for spreading the love with your tech!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Overall good gimbal with some rooms for improvement
customer_reviews.text: I liked The product is minimally designed. It is stylish. I don’t like the fact that there in no backlight in the buttons for dark environment. The first time I opened the box, the battery was dead so I don’t know if that’s what it is supposed to be. Overall, the video quality is good. It does what is advertised. I found Balancing a little hassle so that can be also improved.
customer_reviews.author: TY

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Galaxy S10+
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to make this work but my Galaxy S10+ will not work on this. It's not big enough to hold it properly. I waisted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't connect over bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: This item never connected to Bluetooth. I tried reinstalling the app, using a different phone, connecting through the app vs the phone...nothing. My watch and headphone both use bluetooth with zero issues so for this to fall off constantly and not be able to find the gimbal is very disappointing. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Marian Diop

customer_reviews.title: DJI does great R&D.  Product rocks.
customer_reviews.text: Smooth videos with fluid controls and smart design. App is nice and easy to use. Tripod mount on bottom of handle is a nice feature for adding lights or fixing to tripod. Buttons feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this gimbal
customer_reviews.text: awesome gimbal for the price, very very smooth movement, awesome for beginners, use my smartphone and a gopro, and no problems with either. better with your phone because the ap has a lot of options.
customer_reviews.author: DVanto

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Plugged in charged for 2 hrs. Never powered up. Tried several times different ways installed and uninstalled software on phone. Severely disappointed. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Tex-son

customer_reviews.title: Fun gadget!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is super cool. After you charge and get the app installed its pretty sweet to "track an object" on your iphone and have it follow along. Now I need more things to record!
customer_reviews.author: Scooby Doo

customer_reviews.title: Hard setting up
customer_reviews.text: We had previously had a cheap version which was very easy to set up but battery life wasn't very good. This has a much better battery life but comes at the added weight of it. I have an iphone XS plus and this barely fits in the cradle and is hard to balance it. Hope in time to get more use from it.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Pointon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for our 14-year old aspiring photographer/filmmaker. He’s thrilled. The device is sturdy, well-made, and came very well packaged. Can’t wait to see what our son creates with this tool!
customer_reviews.author: mamag1997

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working on 3rd use. Yes, it's charged up.
customer_reviews.text: I've used the Osmo Mobile 2 only two times since unboxing 4 months ago. It seems there is already a hardware issue and it is now unusable. What a trash product. I'm trying to deal with DJI support now to get it warrantied or fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: OSMO MOBILE 2 GOING HAYWIRE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got the Osmo Mobile 2 a week ago. I was so impressed with how easy setting up the gimbal using my Samsung Galaxy 8plus... Then a crazy thing happenned, 2 days ago... it started acting out by itself.... IT'S BEEN ACTING HAYWIRE... to the point that it almost smash my phone especially when you try and do calibration.... Now, I am thinking of just returning it....
customer_reviews.author: Marc Santos

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work properly out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Did not work even when it was brand new. It would function for a few minutes and then start dying over and over making it useless. Currently going through the long process of getting it repaired.
customer_reviews.author: SadSandwich

customer_reviews.title: I’ve tried but no luck making it work right.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve done i can do to set it up went on utube and watched how to set up and only twice have I got it to work, so for a waste of money hope others aren’t have the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: DannyT

customer_reviews.title: Another great product from DJI
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to use straight out of the box. I bought it to shoot some behind the scenes footage of a photoshoot with Keanu Reeves for extra footage. The footage I was able to achieve was astounding.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Thomas Photography

customer_reviews.title: Shoot cinema-quality videos with just your smartphone
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product with great value for money. The added value is the smartphone app which enables to unleash the full potential of the gymbal. Excellent battery life, almost flawless operation. The only issues that I have encountered are the dimensions, which make it not so portable, the system to attach the smartphone is not that comfortable to attach/disattach, so you end up keeping it attached for the most of time. The built-in USB port to charge your device could be a smart feature but sometimes it's impossible to attach the charging cable to the smartphone. Otherwise it's a very good product and for around 100$ I can definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Martino Taffetani

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for mobile image & video capturing
customer_reviews.text: Great design, light weight and easy to setup. Made capturing my nephews basketball games very easy. Small footprint so it does not require any addition space like tripods tend to take up. Crowd friendly product that allows you freedom to move and capture.
customer_reviews.author: Myron M.

customer_reviews.title: Must have phone accessory if you use video
customer_reviews.text: After seeing my buddy's I knew that I wanted one (Happy Father's Day to me!). It works great with my iPhone XR. The app works really well. I enjoy some of the automated features too. It is great! I did buy a case to carry it in.
customer_reviews.author: Kirkules

customer_reviews.title: Easy of Use
customer_reviews.text: My phone a Samsung S 8+ was difficult to balance. The phone appears to be top heavy in this device.
customer_reviews.author: Den

customer_reviews.title: Great for shooting video on your iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it for very long, but the DJI OSMO 2 works great and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: RedElite

product_meta.title: DJI CP.ZM.00000064.01 osmo Mobile 2 Handheld Smartphone Gimbal (Single Unit), Gray
product_meta.description: Share Your Story:The Osmo Mobile 2 is a handheld smartphone gimbal made for the storyteller in all of us. Whatever your passion, wherever your destination, and whenever you feel inspired, capture moments with cinematic movement and incredible ease. Using a lightweight design, intelligent functions, and a long-lasting battery, the Osmo Mobile 2 lets you share your story. Android Version v3.1.52. Requires Android 4.1.2 or later. Compatible with LG G6, LG V20, VIVO X20 Plus, OPPO R9m, OPPO R11s, Google Pixel XL, Google Pixel XL2, Nexus 6P, HUAWEI P10+, HUAWEI P10, HUAWEI P9+, HUAWEI P9, HUAWEI Mate 10, HUAWEI Mate 9, Honor V10, HUAWEI Nova 2, HUAWEI Honor 10, HUAWEI Honor 9, Samsung Galaxy S6, Samsung Galaxy S7, Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge, Samsung Galaxy S8, Samsung Galaxy S8+, Samsung Galaxy S9, Samsung Galaxy S9+, Samsung Galaxy Note 8, Samsung Galaxy Note 5, Mi 8, Mi 6, Mi 5S, Mi Note 3, OnePlus 5T, and Smartisan Nut Pro 2.
feature_bullets: Share Your Story:The Osmo Mobile 2 is a handheld smartphone gimbal made for the storyteller in all of us. Whatever your passion, wherever your destination, and whenever you feel inspired, capture moments with cinematic movement and incredible ease. Using a lightweight design, intelligent functions, and a long-lasting battery, the Osmo Mobile 2 lets you share your story.

Stable and Smooth Moves:The Osmo Mobile 2 was built to film on the go. Just select your subject and ActiveTrack will follow, using built-in sensors and a brushless motors to ensure stability. Whether it’s small vibrations from a skateboard or more intense instability from jumping, this smartphone stabilizer stays steady.

Lightweight and Portable:Now you can take your story anywhere. The Osmo Mobile 2 is made of a high-strength composite material cuts the weight to just 485g, perfect for all-day use. Also, its modified design now supports more compact folding for increased portability. Move, shoot, and share with the Osmo Mobile 2.

Hours of Live Streaming:Go live! With up to 15 hours of battery life, the Osmo Mobile 2 can also charge your smartphone for hours of streaming. Beautify mode also keeps you looking great in front of the camera.
Time in Motion.Cinematic Zoom Control.Reveal a Bigger World with Panoramas.
